lines.text: They have to stop him... or it'll mean the end of everything!
Hey, this Blueheart's music is great, huh?
I'm feeling better, Patricia, but I'm thirsty... for your blood!
That'll fix ya, you friggin' monsters!

[Spotting a helicopter sitting in a nearby field]
Look! Do you believe it?
Can you... can you fly one of those things?
Till yesterday it was my job!

[Roger runs out of ammo in front of a crowd of zombies]
It's empty! Looks like I've had it!
